x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description:
Dynamic Approvers based on the entity selected by the use
This script inlcude is supported to the reference qualifier in the Dynamic Approval Variable set
Parameter in the reference qualifier to be used:
javascript: dynamicapprovers(current.variables.entity_id.u_region.getDisplayValue());
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Dynamic Dropdown based on Variable
